original_title: LIVE SYMPATHY 2018 Phantasy Star Series 30th Anniversary
overview: Home video release of Live Sympathy 2018 held at Differ Ariake on March 24, 2018. Comes with all 15 types of item codes for the game, PS 30th anniversary sticker, bonus footage including behind-the-scenes, scenes from daytime live, and comments from staff. Blu-ray comes with live footage mainly from the night performance with partial footage from daytime live.
title: LIVE SYMPATHY 2018 Phantasy Star Series 30th Anniversary
